headline: IDEX Corporation Declares Regular Quarterly Cash Dividend
summary: NORTHBROOK, Ill., May 08, 2025--IDEX Corp. (NYSE:IEX) announces a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.71 per common share, the company's 122nd consecutive quarterly dividend.

headline: 3 Cash-Producing Stocks Skating on Thin Ice
summary: Generating cash is essential for any business, but not all cash-rich companies are great investments. Some produce plenty of cash but fail to allocate it effectively, leading to missed opportunities.
